data.name: برسان مدیریت
data.description: We as one of the Holding Iranian private sector contractors of Oil, Gas, Railway and Subway system, Petrochemical, Power, Water and Building industries projects. The holding has developed the business by improving different subsidiaries in Iran and other Countries. The group and subsidiaries enjoy having high educated and well trained specialists with different skills of engineering, procurement, finance, operation, maintenance, inspection, commercial, trading and transportation services.
